TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IStyleConnector

Docs.summary: Provides methods used internally by the WPF XAML parser to attach events and event setters in compiled XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IStyleConnector> class is not intended for use by anything other than the WPF XAML markup compiler. It is referenced by generated code that does event wiring for markup that involves templates or a similar factory model.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Connect (int connectionId, object target);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Connect(int32 connectionId, object target) cil managed
Public Sub Connect (connectionId As Integer, target As Object)
public: void Connect(int connectionId, System::Object ^ target);
abstract member Connect : int * obj -> unit

Docs.param: The unique connection ID for event wiring purposes.
Docs.summary: Attaches events on event setters and templates in compiled content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IStyleConnector> class is not intended for use by anything other than the WPF XAML markup compiler.
